dialogue.introduction: U-um... my name is Isonami. Pleased to meet you.
dialogue.library_intro: Ninth ship of the special-type destroyers, Isonami. Though I participated in many different battles, after getting damaged, I ended up in the marine guard and rear patrol. I'll do my best!
dialogue.secretary1: Ah, yes... um... I'll do my best.
dialogue.secretary2: Yes, Admiral. Do you need help with anything?
dialogue.wedding: Umm…. Admiral… do you have a girlfriend?.... Oh, so that's it. Fufu, hmm~ I see~♪
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral, there seems to be a message for you.
dialogue.equipment1: With this, I can work harder with this right...?
dialogue.supply: With this, can I work even harder?
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Is it ok if I take a short paid vacation.... Oh, no, it's nothing.
dialogue.docking_complete: Um..looks like a ship has been fully repair.
dialogue.ship_construction: Ah. A new comrade is here, I wonder if she'll be my friend...?
dialogue.start_a_sortie: It's time to sortie... Yes! I'll do my best...!
dialogue.night_battle: This is where, the time I exert my best...!
dialogue.mvp: I can do it if I try! I'm so happy!
dialogue.christmas_2014: So pretty... that Christmas tree... I see, so it's that time of the year again... *sighs*...
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Admiral....Admiral! Ah, um, please accept this! H-h-here!
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: It's the rainy season. It is somewhat calming, so I feel that the rainy season has its up-side. What, Miyuki-chan? That's not it? Eh?!
